pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Inference in Difference-in-Differences and Event Study Designs // Provides functions to conduct robust inference in difference-in-differences and event study designs by implementing the methods developed in Rambachan Roth (2023) doi:10.1093/restud/rdad018, "A More Credible Approach to Parallel Trends" [Previously titled "An Honest Approach..."]. Inference is conducted under a weaker version of the parallel trends assumption. Uniformly valid confidence sets are constructed based upon conditional confidence sets, fixed- length confidence sets and hybridized confidence sets.
